text: Megyn Kelly has since apologized for her shocking statements. Megyn Kelly hosted a shocking segment on an episode of her morning talk show Megyn Kelly Today this week and during the segment, she defended LuAnn de Lesseps ’ Diana Ross Halloween costume.
